website_summaries.verdict: This small starter set of magnetic wooden blocks is a green alternative to the plastic tile sets commonly sold.
pros: Nontoxic blocks contain no lead or plastic and feature a water-based lacquer finish
Magnets aren't overly strong, but they allow you to build structures that would be impossible with regular blocks
cons: This kit is pricey compared to others on the market, and the way the blocks can connect is limited

customer_reviews.title: Skip the 14 piece set!
customer_reviews.text: If you buy tegu blocks, don’t chose this 14 piece set- buy a set that does not include the large rectangle blocks! The two included with this set are too weak to connect with any other tegu OR the magnetic chalkboard that I planned to store them on! My 4 year old actually said he was sad that he couldn’t get them to work. He likes building cars with the other shapes and the wheels from another tegu set we purchased. With the exception of the rectangles, they all stick to the chalkboard easily! 2 stars because these toys are expensive and each piece should have quality magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are much more expensive than other magnetic blocks. However, they are amazing!! My son loves them!! The paint is high quality and hasn't chipped in a year of playing with them. All sides are magnetic. Awesome toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anothrthng

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service from company
customer_reviews.text: After one day two blocks had paint that was rubbing off because they were sanded flat enough and the glue holding bits together wasn’t even so the hairline crack was creating rubbing. I wrote company for block replacement and they ignored!!! I have had multiple sets, but after this l am done. I am not interested in wasting resources to return and reorder, thy can send me two blocks like a normal company or l will continue to NOT recommend stick with new magnatiles instead.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great set of blocks for Preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small set for my classroom. I teach preschool at a public school and half of my class is ‘typical’ and half have special needs. These blocks appeal to all my students. I have left them at my discovery table for a few weeks and they are still playing and exploring with them. I might purchase more when they go on sale and I have some extra funds.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but with only 14 it's not enough to build anything
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool, I just wish there were more if them. 14 blocks is enough to play around with them but not enough to build anything really. Our little one loves playing with these and experimenting with the magnetic forces.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: ... who is two and I thought they would be good for airplane travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson who is two and I thought they would be good for airplane travel. But they only connect one way and it's very frustrating to do anything with them except clump them together. I would have returned them if I had really tested them prior to the trip but it was too late by the time I realized they were overpriced and underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for exercising imaginations
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my nephews. They love to build things out of their imaginations and Tegu blocks have been great in helping them do this. They build trains, airplanes, dinosaur homes, etc. with this and it can go on all day. Best part is it entertains them enough to forget about tv and gadgets. The magnets are perfect although not all sides have it So they get to be more creative in bringing their “masterpieces” together. It is a you that brings together different ages and you have their mommy chiming in too every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Toy is fine, but I received a used product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for young kids. However, I was disappointed that I received one that had been used and returned, as we are giving this as a gift and it's very obvious it has been opened (box corners dented and flaps bent, blocks in the wrong place, demonstration magnet missing from box). I will have to return it and hope that the next one we get isn't obviously a used and returned product, so it doesn't look like we are regifting it.
customer_reviews.author: lasky13

customer_reviews.title: We love these blocks
customer_reviews.text: We love these blocks but why this got 4 stars is there doesn't seem to be enough in this size. I'd get the larger 42 block size as it has more to do with. But the blocks and magnets themselves are great. We have a toddler and a puppy, so far neither has destroyed them!
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids can play with these for hours and hours. I love these so much, I stock up on them when they go on sale and give them as gifts. The wood is sturdy, there is no exposed magnets and the paint has not chipped. Love these and as an adult will sit and play with these too! In comparison to magformers - my kids do enjoy magformers more than these probably because magnets on magformers are a bit stronger but both provide hours of creative fun.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: A Gift That Keeps On Giving!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 different sets for my grandchildren... they love it!! They walk around the house with carrying case (color-coordinated toiletry bag, with space to grow as block collection grows). They've spent hours playing with this magnetic block set, fun & educational!!
customer_reviews.author: lms

customer_reviews.title: Expensive - worth it
customer_reviews.text: The wood is excellent quality and very nice and smooth. Magnets are strong enough but not too strong. I actually like that the magnets are not on every single side because it teaches the kids to use their brains and trouble-shoot. I do wish they were a little more affordable so we could get a large set, but understand why. The quality is definitely there. Thank you for providing a fun-toxic free toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Gerber

customer_reviews.title: amusing the baby all day long
customer_reviews.text: This block set is keeping my baby busy the whole time. He is obsessed with the rectangular pieces. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is the high price tag and the fact that some of the pieces don't pass the toilet paper tube test and can potentially be hazardous for the child. So I put those pieces away for now.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was really doubtful about whether my twin grandaughters would like magnetism with building blocks, but they love them—so I was wrong! They took their set home, but I am buying another set to keep them occupied at my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kaggy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box ruined presentation, but toys look fun
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because the box appeared a bit mushy from moisture and banged up on the edges, but the toy inside looks in good condition. Looking forward to gifting!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sun

customer_reviews.title: Magnets not working on openinf
customer_reviews.text: The main cubes for building are not magnetically working. Very disappointing. We have bought other items from tegu with no problem. And can’t find out where to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are so cool, you can't keep from fiddling with them
customer_reviews.text: These things are so cool, you can't keep from fiddling with them. I thought more would be better but they aren't needed. This set is enough. I read they were made in Ecuador or someplace similar, to raise money to help the people living there. If you aren't familiar with these blocks, they are magnetic. Great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not as versatile as Magnatiles
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty pricy and don’t build as many things as Magnatiles - these are definitely prettier but everyone in our house from kids to adults prefer Magnatiles
customer_reviews.author: Tara D

customer_reviews.title: Fun little set of blocks
customer_reviews.text: I love the tegu blocks. They are fun for my kids to play with and build different shapes. The magnets are nice because they hold the blocks together easily while building and for storage. I store my small set in a little makeup pouch for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have fun playing with blocks that stick together. Makes them think as sometimes the magnets repel and other times they stick. Helps teach about polarity.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: A great toy that will help expand creativity and motor skills.
customer_reviews.text: A great toy that will help expand creativity and motor skills. The magnets are not too strong to where it could pinch your little child's fingers but plenty strong enough to build some cool structures. To top it all off, buying this toy helps provide jobs, education and development to third world countries like Honduras. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Not Strong Enough!
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are not strong enough and limit what you can build. Should have better (stronger) magnets for the price. I wouldn't recommend them to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: So Cool!!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are so cool! my kid is very entertained with them. The colors of the blocks are very pretty. The material of the blocks is also very well made. They can also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic fields is a cool concept to use with blocks
customer_reviews.text: This block set is so neat! It's taking my 2 year old a little time to figure it out, but he's starting to understand that the proper sides must be lined up. The magnetic fields is a cool concept to use with blocks, and the possibilities for creativity are endless!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: this set is completely useless. You can barely make anything with this set ...
customer_reviews.text: Unless youve purchased one of the $300+ sets, this set is completely useless. You can barely make anything with this set alone, but the quality is amazing! Magnets can be a little tricky and don't hold up as great as you see in the photos, but theyre still fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: We love these, wish they weren’t so pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome set. But you need like a lot more. Wish they’d weren’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: They are one of the few toys she can sit and play with for a long time and I love that she will use her imagination with them
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves these. They are one of the few toys she can sit and play with for a long time and I love that she will use her imagination with them. We can't wait to add more to our collection.

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: A piece fell one time and chipped. Not durable and worried about the safety of this with kids.

customer_reviews.title: Tegu are great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: We love Tegu blocks and these are no exception! My daughter loves to build towers and knock them over. With these blocks she can build all kinds of fun shaped towers while learning how magnets work. She doesn't have to have the blocks exactly aligned as they will pull themselves together so it's great for a 2 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 4 year old but all the kids (and adults) love playing with Tegu.

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic blocks

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to play with, I thought the magnets were a great idea, and would result in less frustrating block "knock downs", so far they have been great, I think the adults love them just as much as she does!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy

customer_reviews.title: Fascination
customer_reviews.text: My beaver of a child loves them. He’s been able to chew through his crib rails, but these blocks are impenetrable to his teeth.

customer_reviews.title: New cool classic blocks

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money!

customer_reviews.title: Love them

My only complaint is that the book that comes with this smaller set shows diagrams to make things you cannot because youv don't have enough blocks. My son really wanted to build the car but we couldn't because we did not have the wheels.

customer_reviews.title: Very good but very expensive toy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, amusing toy for a child. Magnets work well even though in wood. One star less for the quantity & price. Not many pieces for the child to develop & use his imagination for the amount of money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: NJNANCY

customer_reviews.title: Creative challenge.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old grandson loves it. A fun creative challenge.

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit
customer_reviews.text: The little one and a half year old we gave this too absolutely loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy

customer_reviews.title: Fun, colorful blocks

customer_reviews.title: Corner almost chipped off
customer_reviews.text: Had to knock one star off because one piece already chipped. The corner is on the verge of breaking off. This is in about 6 weeks. That broken corner would scratch anyone, let alone baby.

I will say it was a little pricey for only 12 blocks but the product does seem high quality.

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a toy I feel good about buying her

customer_reviews.title: Awesome creative gift

I think it's good for him to understand about positive and negative poles. We probably should have gotten the kits with more than 14 pieces.

Only complaint would be that the entire blocks are not magnetic, so there is some limitation on the number of combinations you can make - this can also make it frustrating for the younger kids.

product_meta.title: 14 Piece Tegu Magnetic Wooden Block Set, Tints
product_meta.description: Color:Tints"Click-Clack." It's the iconic sound of two Tegu Blocks coming together. Tegu has reinvented the wooden block in a way that brings new life to a favored classic. By safely embedding magnets into each piece, Tegu Blocks become curiously attractive for both kids and kids at heart. Defy gravity and push your imagination in ways never before possible. No instruction manuals or electronics; just toys that demand imagination and inspire limitless creativity across all ages. Open-ended play is endangered, but we're bringing it back. Created with beautiful Honduran hardwoods and safe water-based finishes, these blocks have proven wildly addictive for kids (and kids at heart) and will encourage the simple joy of creating for generations. This set includes 14 blocks in five shapes: 2 Medium Columns, 4 Short Planks, 4 Long Planks, 2 Cubes and 2 Parallelograms. Tegu blocks come packaged in a beautifully designed box large and rigid enough to store the blocks for many years to come. Also, don't miss out on some really fun factoids about the blocks and their origin on the inside of each package. Each set also includes The Tegu Story -- a booklet containing various building ideas and information about Tegu's social and environmental initiatives. There is something magical about watching a child's imagination unfold. The curiosity. The ingenuity. The creativity. Even more exciting is creating a product that unlocks a child's mind. We exist to create experiences that captivate children in safe, natural and innovative ways. At Tegu, this creativity also meets responsibility. Through socially responsible business practices and humanitarian efforts, we are dedicated to helping the Honduran community with reforestation, education and social outreach initiatives.
feature_bullets: The 14-Piece Set is the perfect introduction to Tegu and the perfect gift for special occasions. Start your Tegu collection with this great starter set and begin discovering your inner builder today. Fully Compatible with ALL other Tegu Magnetic Wooden Set
Brilliantly simple and premium heirloom-quality toy that will last for generations
Curiously attractive and perfect for those seeking toys supporting open-ended and unscripted play
Naturally safe: no lead, no plastic, non-toxic, water-based lacquer finish, no small parts
Tegu support a child’s development over time through play: enhanced fine motor skills, pattern recognition, balance, sense of scale, imaginative play, problem solving, storytelling.
